{"id":434949869,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1609032431,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/434949869/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"The k-th Lexicographical String of All Happy Strings of Length n","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string getHappyString(int n, int k) {\n        \n        int x = 0;\n        string ans;\n        string box;\n        function<void()> dfs = [&]() -> void {\n            if (box.length() == n) {\n                ++x;\n                if (x == k) {\n                    ans = box;\n                }\n                return;\n            }\n            if (x == k) return;\n            for (char i = 'a'; i <= 'c'; ++i) {\n                if (box.size() != 0 && box.back() == i) {\n                    continue;\n                }\n                box.push_back(i);\n                dfs(); \n                box.pop_back();\n                if (x == k) return;\n            }\n        };\n        dfs();\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"the-k-th-lexicographical-string-of-all-happy-strings-of-length-n"}
